slide.title: Using Tidy

blurb.title: Validate and repair your HTML and XHTML documents

slide.blurb: Tidy for PHP is an extension based on the technology found in the %tidy% command line tool which offers a great deal of power when working with HTML or XHTML markup.

list.bullet: Automatically fix malformed HTML and XHTML documents
Remove unnecessary whitespace in HTML to save bandwidth
Convert outdated <FONT> tags into inline stylesheets
Traverse the document tree using an object-based interface (PHP 5 online)
